TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SecurityPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允許將 的安全性動作套用至使用宣告式安全性的程式碼。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宣告所允許的範圍需視用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 安全性屬性所宣告的安全性資訊儲存在屬性目標的中繼資料，而且由系統在執行階段存取。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全性屬性僅用於宣告式安全性。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 命令式安全性，為使用對應的權限類別。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class. 當您使用類別，請遵循與目前要求的權限的安全性動作。When you use the class, follow the security action with the permission(s) that are being requested. 中所定義，可能會要求每個安全性權限列舉型別中有對應的屬性類別。Each security permission that can be requested, as defined in the enumeration, has a corresponding property in the class. 比方說，若要要求存取 unmanaged 程式碼的能力，請遵循正在要求、，如下所示的屬性設定的要求陳述式： `SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, UnmanagedCode=true)`。For example, to demand the ability to access unmanaged code, follow the demand statement with the property setting that is being requested, as follows: `SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, UnmanagedCode=true)`. > [!NOTE] > 例外狀況是否等價列舉型別和屬性是列舉值由屬性 (繼承自類別)。An exception to the equivalence between the enumeration and the properties is that the enumeration value is represented by the property (inherited from the class). 若要要求所有的安全性權限，指定`Unrestricted=true`。To demand all security permissions, specify `Unrestricted=true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此權限可讓.NET Framework 組件，有已整合，以及找到.NET Framework 外部的其他組件重新導向。This permission allows redirection of .NET Framework assemblies that have been unified, as well as other assemblies found outside the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

span.span: Creates and returns a new .
A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只應該由應用程式程式碼永遠不會由安全性系統中，呼叫這個方法。This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code. 在編譯時期，屬性會將安全性宣告轉換成中繼資料的序列化形式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 建立中繼資料中的宣告式安全性資料，從 的權限，此方法會傳回對應至這個屬性。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Execution { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Execution : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否已宣告執行程式碼的權限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to execute code is declared.

value.span: 如果已宣告執行程式碼的權限，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if permission to execute code is declared; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求組件層級的權限會被忽略。A demand for permission at the assembly level is ignored. 如果組件具有的權限執行，權限會自動授與，而設定屬性設為`true`或`false`沒有任何作用。If an assembly has the right to execute, permission is automatically granted, and setting the property to either `true` or `false` has no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::SecurityPermissionFlag Flags { System::Security::Permissions::SecurityPermissionFlag get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::SecurityPermissionFlag value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定包含 使用權限的所有使用權限旗標。

span.span: Gets or sets all permission flags comprising the permissions.

value.span: 使用位元的 OR 運算結合一個或以上的 值。

span.span: One or more of the values combined using a bitwise OR.

exception.span: 嘗試將這個屬性設定為無效的值。

span.span: An attempt is made to set this property to an invalid value.
See for the valid values.
